availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Willis M. Threlkeld (Henry County, Kentucky, resident.)

body.p: Henry County, Kentucky, resident. Kentucky native. Son of Elizabeth Threlkeld. Resident of Henry County in 1860. Owned one enslaved person in Henry County in 1860. Household owned an additional eight enslaved persons in Henry County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Henry County, Subdivision 1, p. 376.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Slave Schedules, Kentucky, Henry County, Subdivision 1, p. 185B.
"Willis Magruder 'Dick' Threlkeld (1835-1907)," Find A Grave, Memorial 90520941, accessed September 29, 2022, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/90520941.
